00030 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00031 #  include <config.h>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 #include <glib.h>
00035 #include <gnome.h>
00036 #include "gpm-common.h"
00037 #include "gpm-libnotify.h"
00038 #if HAVE_LIBNOTIFY
00039 #include <libnotify/notify.h>
00040 #endif
00041 
00052 gboolean
00053 libnotify_event (const gchar *content, const gint urgency, GtkWidget *point)
00054 {
00055 #if HAVE_LIBNOTIFY
00056     NotifyHandle *n = NULL;
00057     NotifyIcon *icon = NULL;
00058     NotifyHints *hints = NULL;
00059     gint x, y;
00060 
00061     /* assertion checks */
00062     g_assert (content);
00063 
00064     if (point) {
00065         get_widget_position (point, &x, &y);
00066         hints = notify_hints_new();
00067         notify_hints_set_int (hints, "x", x);
00068         notify_hints_set_int (hints, "y", y);
00069     }
00070 
00071     /* echo to terminal too */
00072     if (urgency == NOTIFY_URGENCY_CRITICAL)
00073         g_warning ("libnotify: %s : %s", NICENAME, content);
00074     else
00075         g_debug ("libnotify: %s : %s", NICENAME, content);
00076 
00077     /* use default g-p-m icon for now */
00078     icon = notify_icon_new_from_uri (GPM_DATA "gnome-power.png");
00079     n = notify_send_notification (NULL, /* replaces nothing */
00080                NULL,
00081                urgency,
00082                NICENAME, content,
00083                icon, /* icon */
00084                TRUE, NOTIFY_TIMEOUT,
00085                hints, /* hints */
00086                NULL, /* no user data */
00087                0);   /* no actions */
00088     notify_icon_destroy(icon);
00089     if (!n) {
00090         g_warning ("failed to send notification (%s)", content);
00091         return FALSE;
00092     }
00093     return TRUE;
00094 #else
00095     GtkWidget *widget = NULL;
00096 
00097     /* assertion checks */
00098     g_assert (content);
00099 
00100     widget = gnome_message_box_new (content,
00101             GNOME_MESSAGE_BOX_WARNING,
00102             GNOME_STOCK_BUTTON_OK,
00103             NULL);
00104     gtk_window_set_title (GTK_WINDOW (widget), NICENAME);
00105     gtk_widget_show (widget);
00106     return TRUE;
00107 #endif
00108 }
00109 
00121 gboolean
00122 libnotify_init (const gchar *nicename)
00123 {
00124     gboolean ret = TRUE;
00125 
00126     /* assertion checks */
00127     g_assert (nicename);
00128 #if HAVE_LIBNOTIFY
00129     ret = notify_glib_init (nicename, NULL);
00130 #endif
00131     return ret;
00132 }
